trans-unit.source: Contains fields that can be used to pass event delegates to a thread-safe <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize*"></xref> method of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref>.
Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownElement"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
Gets or sets an object that represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnreferencedObject"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.UnreferencedObjectEventHandler"></xref> that points to the event handler.
